pullrequest.title: Add support for 16 bit Grayscale and RGB camera image types.

content.raw: yeah, I think this is a good change. I looked in my overnight testing logs, and I see this test fail about 20% of the time with backtraces similar to the ones that inspired this change (one thread calling `rendering::fini` while the server thread is calling `sensors::run_once`)
content.html: yeah, I think this is a good change. I looked in my overnight testing logs, and I see this test fail about 20% of the time with backtraces similar to the ones that inspired this change (one thread calling rendering::fini while the server thread is calling sensors::run_once)
